        public override object ParseDictionary(global::System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, object?> value, global::GraphQL.IValueConverter valueConverter)

            return new global::Sample.DerivedInput
            {
                BaseProperty = ParseField<string>(_fields[0]),
                DerivedProperty = ParseField<int>(_fields[1]),
                LocalProperty = ParseField<bool>(_fields[2])

            TFieldType ParseField<TFieldType>(global::GraphQL.Types.FieldType fieldType)
            {
                if (value.TryGetValue(fieldType.Name, out var fieldValue))
                {
                    return (TFieldType)valueConverter.GetPropertyValue(fieldValue, typeof(TFieldType), fieldType.ResolvedType!)!;
                }
                return default!;
            }
        }

        public override bool IsValidDefault(object value)
        {
            if (value is not global::Sample.DerivedInput obj)
                return false;

            if (_fields[0].ResolvedType!.IsValidDefault(obj.BaseProperty))
                return false;
            if (_fields[1].ResolvedType!.IsValidDefault(obj.DerivedProperty))

            if (_fields[2].ResolvedType!.IsValidDefault(obj.LocalProperty))
                return false;

            return true;
        }

            if (value == null)

            ProcessField(_fields[0], obj.BaseProperty);
            ProcessField(_fields[1], obj.DerivedProperty);
            ProcessField(_fields[2], obj.LocalProperty);

            return objectValue;

            void ProcessField(global::GraphQL.Types.FieldType fieldType, object? fieldValue)

                    ?? throw new global::System.InvalidOperationException($"Could not convert value in global::Sample.DerivedInput.{fieldType.Name} to AST");
